title: Mobile homes already have huge utility bills. Congress may make it worse.
description: The U.S. House of Representatives approved a bill to transfer energy standards for manufactured homes from the Department of Energy to HUD.
content: The U.S. House of Representatives approved a bill to transfer energy standards for manufactured homes from the Department of Energy to HUD.
